description: Pioneer ACO PUF - To address the increasing number of requests for Pioneer ACO data, the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) has created a standard analytical file that CMS can use to efficiently satisfy these requests. It is the intent of CMS to publish the ACO-level public-use file (PUF) that contains ACO-specific metrics as well as summarized beneficiary and provider information for performance year 1-3 of the Pioneer ACO Model.
keyword: Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovations
Publically Available Data File - for download
title: Pioneer ACO PUF
